name: FPaperTerrainMaterialRule
doc: Rule for a single section of a terrain material

StartCap: The sprite to use at the 'left' (closest to spline start) edge of the terrain segment
Body: A set of sprites to randomly choose to fill up the interior space between the caps in a terrain segment
EndCap: The sprite to use at the 'right' (closest to spline end) edge of the terrain segment
MinimumAngle: Minimum slope angle (in degrees) to apply this rule
MaximumAngle: Maximum slope angle (in degrees) to apply this rule
bEnableCollision: If true, collision is enabled for sections matching this rule
CollisionOffset: How much should the collision be lofted from the spline (positive values go out from the spline, negative values go in to the spline)
DrawOrder: Specify a draw order for different materials in a spline. Smaller draw orders are drawn first, negative values are allowed.
Description: Readable description for the rule (unused anywhere, just for clarity when editing the material)
